Something that doesn't exist. Blew out my knee yesterday so here I sit trying to take my mind off it on the lakeside deck. I can think of worse places to moan. (Me for Most Digressions.)  Need categories and nominees.  The award for Most Helpful,  Big Cliff, the award should be named after him.  Most threads Hi-Jacked, taken off the rails,  I nominate myself and M2B2.  No Thread I won't Comment On,  M2B2 is my nominee.  Law Enforcement Officer of the Year,  Has to be Art!  Best Aircraft,  Irishfeild, does anyone else own one.  Most Argumentative,  Take your pick.  What other categories?  This is just for a laugh, there are no such awards, maybe not yet! Who knows. And yet, not one award referred to fishing..........HUH. . . . . .

Here I am worrying about the guy. Calls 3 or 4 times and doesn't leave a message. I told him I think he has ADD, not the attention deficit where one can't concentrate the kind where he needs attention.  Here is a 4 page thread in the middle of fishing season and the word FISH hasn't been used not 1 time. I can understand why the diehards are dropping off the board like flies.
Oh. I forgot  Muskymatt : 7th place trophy. (Aka at least you tried. The Ottawa Sens award).

How about a category for "Thread Killer".  I just mention that because I have a complex about being the last post on a thread. I find I do kill a lot of threads too.  I just saved ya on this one

Best friend you've never shaken hands with  GBW
Best friend you've never shaken hands with  GBW Hey thanks Bro!  With luck we can make a few plans for Aug 24 and 25 time frame
Do the rest of us get a participation award? Its not fair to leave anyone out. LOL  S.

It must be a 2pile show crossing the border Doug.  Yes Joey is the first member of the Hall of Fame.  We need a special award for Wormdunker too. I miss them both. Those long phone calls and talks on the boat and on the deck with Brian I really miss. He was a "Far away talker". When he spoke he sounded like he was 50' away and he's 5 feet away in the boat. Soft yelling may be a way to describe it. I told him quit yelling, he yelled back "I'm not yelling" and he really wasn't. After all that time we shot the Bull I didn't know he ran his own D.J. service for years. Maybe that explains the soft yelling. I have not met many people that could keep up with him slamming back Beer I tell ya'. I don't know where he put it all and I never saw him blitzed. I put out a beer for him and I, go back in the cottage to get something and he's done. After a while I learned to give him 2 at a time. I once said "Bri you can have all the beer you want here bud but 1 more and you have to sleep here". "With Ticha?" he asks. I said "no you can't sleep with her but you can scrub her back in the shower, I'll get you a step ladder." We had a laugh. He was a funny guy. I miss the duffus.
Yep...my pal Big Cliff for Most Humble...  He sez I can read his book on humility when he finishes writing it !
Hahaha this is all true! We became really good friends the second we met  And not just two beer at a time, two TALL boys at a time!  Miss ya Wormdunker RIP
I don't buy tall boys, by the time I finish one it's at room temp. Heck the same goes for a regular size brew.

Not Brian lol. First time he showed up her I had dinner ready and a 6 pack. He eats, drinks 4 beer in about 15 minutes. Im thinking crap, he can't drive anywhere, plus he's gonna eat/drink everything I have lol  Runs to his truck, grabs 12 tall boys, cracks one. Talks about his truck for what seemed like 6 hours.  Go back in the back yard by the guest area. I think I had two more beer and that 12 pack was done lol  But you're never know he even had a beer??? It's like it had zero effect on him at all

Geoff, that can't be you. Too old. Maybe not, saw Tony Hawk on TV, he's no spring chicken today. Am I too old to know who Tony Hawk is?  I do know who is in the picture on the wall though and the artist. Does anyone recognize it? My guess would be Terry Sawchuck

My guess would be Terry Sawchuck the artist's initials are KD (no, not Kraft Dinner)

Phil was the forward
Phil was the forward Got it.  Phorward Phil

No winners yet. Ken Dryden is not the artist. He is KD however.  quote name="GBW" post="1009243" timestamp="1500313282"] the artist's initials are KD (no, not Kraft Dinner)   "At The Crease" is the name of the painting. It is Tony Esposito. Winner Winner Chicken Dinner. He is wearing his Black Hawks uniform though. He was pulled for Dryden in game 7, the rest is history.  AKA Shag, born in 73!!!! Young Pup eh? We had a Sr. Football practice after watching that game at a buddies parents apartment. We were so excited we threw Mrs. Sinker's sofa over the balcony 3 floors down. We were sober after 20 minutes of 4 quarter drills from the 20 yard line. Coach knew we would be pissed and had 2 garbage cans on the field ready for our Beer. The next day we had to pass the hat to buy her a new couch. She hoped there was a game 8, she wanted a new dining room set.  How in heavens sake would I know who Tony Hawk is? 86' I was 32 and on my 4th home. A bit to busy to know anything about skate boarding. I have to give it to that kid, he turned a single VHS tape he sold from the trunk of his Dad's car into a multi million dollar empire.
How did I miss that? I nearly peed myself. I won't let my wife be in the same room when he is on the phone with me.
He was a Center. Is that a forward? I can't skate.
glad i made a few drinks casualties today ahahha
